header_19.raw_response: Diet Coke falls somewhere in the middle of the zesty-bland spectrum. While it does have a distinct taste profile, it doesn't have the intense spiciness or tanginess that would make it zesty. Instead, it has a characteristic refreshing, slightly sweet, and carbonated taste that is recognizable but not overly complex or stimulating. Given these characteristics, I would place Diet Coke around the 30 mark on this spectrum, indicating that it leans more towards the zesty side but is not extremely zesty.
